definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lap, lick (NH id., Pi.; Ar. laq=a lick, lap of dog (Wahrm));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לָֽקְקוּ]] 1Ki 21:19; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇלֽק]] Ju Jdg 7:5, Jdg 7:5; 3 mpl. [[יׇלֽ֫קּוּ]] 1Ki 21:19, [[וַיָּלֽ֫קּוּ]] 1Ki 22:38 ;—lap, [[יׇלֽק בִּלְשׁוֹנוֹ מִן־]] [[הַמַּיִם]] Ju Jdg 7:5, like of dog v:Jdg 7:5 (abs.); of dogs lapping up blood (acc.), 1Ki 21:19, 1Ki 21:19, 1Ki 22:38.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. c. art. [[הַמְַלַקְקִים]] Ju Jdg 7:6 ([[בְּיׇדָם אֶל־פִּיהֶם]] is erron. gloss, v. GFM), v:Jdg 7:7; in both = lap, lap up (=
